item.description: Saffron An avid reader of the Punjab Kesari, my father uses the toilet longer than any man. Forgetting how these conversations always end, I express my repugnance over a mob lynching. If they know beef hurts our sentiments, he asks me, why eat it? On the screen, a pack of gray wolves hungry for days, hound a reindeer. I tell him lynchings are unjust even if someone eats a cow solely to offend.
